transcript:
Customer: Mujhe police ki hai sir.

Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ji good morning Pradeep sir.
Executive: Ha ji good morning ji boliye. Sir sir aapne kal wo sir feedback de diya mujhe not satisfied ka.
Executive: Ji ha not satisfied ka feedback diya sir maine.
Customer: To bataiye aapne mujhe kuch bataya nahi matlab mere se aisa kya ho gaya aapne mere se.
Customer: Suniye dekhiye aap dekho.
Customer: Koi by lead aisi nahi mil rahi matlab bulk ki.
Customer: Theek hai na.
Executive: Wo sir company ka nahi tha sir feedback. Sir wo mere liye feedback wo mera feedback tha company ka nahi tha wo.
Customer: To fir sir aap ek baat bataiye kuch ek baat bataiye koi bhi order nahi mil raha bataiye kya kare sir.
Executive: Sir ji sir aap aap mujhe call kijiye na aap phone hi kahan uthate aap call kijiye mujhe bataiye wo kal busy tha sir main.
Executive: Achcha theek hai ye bataiye dekhiye isme likh ke bhi aaya tha message mein ki hi Pradeep thanks for speaking with Priyanshu Pal to matlab Priyanshu Pal ka feedback bhi mere liye pucha tha wo to mere usme performance account ho gaya pata hai company ka to alag jata hai feedback ye mera tha maine kaha puchu sir kyuki aapke pass to number bhi aap se to baat bhi hoti rehti hai meri meeting bhi hoti rehti hai.
Customer: Wo baat thi achcha.
Customer: Ab main to dekho us pe satisfied likh raha tha not satisfied likha likh raha tha maine kuch jyada dhyan nahi kara maine not satisfied kar diya.
Executive: Samajh gaya aapne socha hoga company ka hai.
Customer: Haan jaise jab company ka whatsapp pe nahi aata hai sir kabhi wo mail pe aata hai.
Customer: Achcha achcha achcha. To ab mujhe bataiye thoda sa kya kahan pe dikkat aa rahi hai.
Customer: Dekho dikkat sabse badi ye hai bulk mein order nahi mil raha sabse badi dikkat.
Executive: To abhi deal ho rahi hai nahi ho rahi sir apni.
Customer: Dekhiye main kya keh raha hu ye laga liye free baithe hain free.
Customer: Ek ek do order mile bhi the wo chhote order hi mile the 10 10 12 15 hazar ke mile the ye laga lo aapki id se ye laga lo jab se ab tak aap yakin nahi karenge morning ka time hai main jhoot nahi bol raha 30 hazar rupay aap se aapke isme se humne kamaye hain bas only 30 hazar rupay.
Executive: Matlab abhi paisa bhi nahi nikla kul mila ke na.
Customer: Ab ye bataiye jab se ab tak 30 hazar rupay kya hai batao.
Customer: Aap dekho main main to apni taraf se puri koshish kar raha hu pura time de raha hu India mart ko jab bhi time milta 5 minute 10 minute 20 minute aadhe ghante mein ek ghante mein pure din dekhta rehta hu raat ko bhi dekhta rehta hu activate rehta hu main apni taraf se koi kami nahi chhod raha main.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Aur aap jo hai na maine aapko pehle bhi kaha tha ab bhi keh raha hu mujhe dikkat bas ek hi aa rahi hai bulk mein nahi milne order pata nahi kya issue aa raha hai aur aur ki website mein check karta hu khub achi by lead a rahi a rahi hai aur ke pass.
Executive: Nahi jabki apna profile to top mein rehta hai listing maine dikhai bhi thi shayad aapko main to dusron ko jo log dusre wale hai na jo naye log hain main to unko even aapka jab kabhi baat hoti to main unko aapka hi profile dikhata hu main dikhata hu dekhiye ye hai ye Pradeep ji main hi inka account dekhta hu dekhiye inka listing top mein matlab jo main main jagah hai waha pe listing to apna top pe aata hai kahin pehle kahin dusre number pe to main to unko aapko.
Customer: Main bhi ab suno jo mere matlab ki by lead nahi hai fir bhi main unhe jaan boojh ke le raha hu jaise man kar chalo 200 rup ka order hai 500 rup ka order hai lekin main use wahi isliye leta hu taki hamara is state mein is city mein purchase rahe be fuzul ki bhi leta hu main aur aapko ye lagta hai ab by lead itni purchase kar raha Pradeep to koi bhi hamare matlab ki by lead nahi hai koi bhi.
Customer: Iska samadhan nikalo kaise nikalna hai dekho thodi bahut hame bhi kar do dekho is time mamla bilkul down chal raha hai minus mein hai.
Executive: Nahi aap aap mujhe bata de aapka kai din se call nahi aaya na Pradeep sir jab maine wahi meeting kari thi meeting hui thi to mujhe laga ki sahi chal raha hoga nahi to maine Pradeep sir to call kar dete mujhe to ek din Salman sir se bhi baat hui thi unka call aaya tha mere pass.
Customer: Haan haan. To unse discussion hua tha to maine pucha to wahi bol rahe the ki unhone bola ki ha parties wagera ke phone to aa rahe hain ek do party milne bhi aane wali hai to mujhe yahi laga ki ha phone pe baat ho rahi hai dekho suno phone pe baat ho rahi hai ab ek dedh do mahina ho gaya ignore kar rahe hain baat chit hi nahi kar rahe party wale.
Executive: Achcha. Haan ek do party se baat bhi hua tha.
Executive: Achcha isiliye main fir thoda sa ho gaya maine kaha aapka phone bhi nahi aaya unhone bola ki ha party wagera aane wali to maine chalo abhi sahi chal raha hai to jyada chhedkhani nahi karte hain isme mujhe aap batao to dekhta hi rehta hu.
Customer: Dekho abhi hai dekho Priyanshu ji dekho ab jo bhi hai na karo usko jaldi se jaldi karo.
Executive: Theek hai chaliye main isko dekhta hu aur aap mujhe beech beech mein batate raha kariye kam se kam jyada nahi to 10 15 din mein ek baar mujhe update dete raha karo aap to main dekhta rahunga matlab waise bhi dekh leta hu but jab aap mujhe batate bhi to mujhe lagta hai sahi chal raha hai to main chhedkhani nahi karta hu isme kuch.
Customer: Haan. Theek hai sir.
Executive: Theek hai thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving bulk orders.

- Only earned ₹30,000 since subscription.

- Parties are ignoring after initial phone calls.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to look into the issue.

- Executive asked for regular updates.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, orders, profile, listing
